short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open various AEM pages faster so you can focus your task, increasing productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Default shortcut key:

Open current page in Editor Mode or WCM-Disabled Mode: Alt + Shift + D
Open current page in Sites: Alt + Shift + S
Open page properties in new tab: Alt + Shift + P
Open current page in CRXDE: Alt + Shift + C

More features coming in the near future!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Changelog:

## v0.2
- Internally reworked how mapping URL settings are stored, It is now future-proof but you will need to key in your previous domain-to-crx mappings again.
- Settings now take effect immediately instead of having to reload the browser.
- Added author to dispatcher URL mapping. This will only affect the "Open Editor / WCMDisabled Mode" command.
- Added quick link function in context menu: Open DAM page and ACS Common page for current domain.
- Added a utility function in context menu: Publish current page.

## v0.1
- First release.
